function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient HVAC standards for diluting indoor air to prevent airborne pathogen transmission in high-occupancy facilities.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne pathogen transmission and potential disease outbreaks in high-occupancy facilities.","Mitigation":"Improvement of HVAC standards, implementation of effective IAQ control measures, and increased ventilation rates.","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, filtration systems, and UVGI systems.","People":"Occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff in high-occupancy facilities.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and HVAC professionals."},{"Description":"Lack of evidence to assess the acceptability and feasibility of IAQ interventions to key stakeholders.","Impact":"Uninformed decision-making, potential resistance to intervention implementation, and stakeholder dissatisfaction.","Mitigation":"Conducting empirical studies, developing frameworks for risk assessment, and engaging key stakeholders in the decision-making process.","Technologies":"Questionnaires, interviews, case analyses, and monitoring tools for IAQ interventions.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and FM practitioners.","Owner":"Researchers, facility management, and FM domain professionals."}]}
